entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
